author: {'steamid': '76561198847573661', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1531515284}

For €15 it is basically a ripoff.
Very basic functionality. Not possible to set place, date or time. Only narration for Gemini. 

Hugely dissapointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137793545', 'num_games_owned': 1395, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1498076919}
review:
曾经给她说过想要带她去看星星。

然后我看到了星星。

而她却早都走掉了。

在湖边，抬头望着星空，一切都是那么安详。

在梦中，银河之中遨游，我答应过你，你在哪里？

（好了，除了价格不能接受，只是看星星涨姿势以外，带她看看星星，就够了）

author: {'steamid': '76561197999225733', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1484860660}
review: It's certainly not Elite Dangerous' galactic star map. There's hardly any control you can exert over the environment to really understand the scale of stuff in space. You can teleport around on the dock and you can teleport to a zoomed out view of the solar system, but it's not to scale. In "The Lab", which is free, there is the same solar system environment and the planets are to scale (plus you can throw them around, so that's neat). Pointing at the constellations and seeing them light up in the sky is by far the biggest selling point, but it's not worth 15 dollars to me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198348173071', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1482712081}

author: {'steamid': '76561198013738830', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1515309769}
review: This isn't bad though it took me a while to realize how to get out into space where I could get the 3d views on everything. Lots of content though at a reasonable price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061194378', 'num_games_owned': 65, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1473760099}
review:
在刚结束的VRhackathon的比赛中，很有幸认识了Matrix的几位成员，也非常欣赏他们在比赛中作品的风格。
听说他们在steam发了这款游戏，比赛完回去就找了找准备体验下。
Stars依然是一款非常不错的游戏，无论是画面还是沉浸感，都相当了得，作为steam上为数不多的国内VR作品，还是值得体验的。希望Matrix日后能给大家带来更棒的作品~！

author: {'steamid': '76561198193486011', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1469498028}
review: Don't waste your money. It's pretty, but horrible narration that you can't actually control - the pause button just doesn't work. It's a crap bit of VR 'education' that was released well before it was ready. Or even tested. Do not buy.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988013157', 'num_games_owned': 3041, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1469027934}
review:
This isn't just a video game, this is your personal planetarium. It's something we all wished for when we were young.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=728179889

With your very first step you are greeted with a sky, filled with millions of stars and pleasant music to go by. Everything looks amazing and natural, especially the planets that just leave you speechless. The whole atmosphere of the game just makes you want to put on your spacesuit, bring your cat and surf the universe.

This game reminds me of "It's Spring Again". It is just as interesting, informative and beautiful. 

[list]
[*] Beautiful graphics with fascinating space and planet design.
[*] Tells you about all the constellations and zodiac signs.
[*] Excellent soothing music.
[*] Something you definitely have to try those VR glasses on.
[*] Achievements will be implemented soon that will keep you focused and interested even more.
[/list]


RU

Это не игра, это ваш домашний, личный планетарий. Ну разве вы не мечтали об этом в детстве?!

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=728179889

При первом же запуске вас встречает необычайно красивое небо, миллионы звезд и приятная музыка. Выглядит все очень классно и натурально. Особенно завораживают виды планет. А какое здесь солнце!!! Так и хочется одеть скафандр, взять с собой котика, и вперед - бороздить просторы вселенной.

Проект чем то напомнил It's Spring Again. Так же интересно, красиво и познавательно.

[list]
    [*]Красивая графика. Виды космоса и планет безумно завораживают.
    [*]Рассказано про все созвездия и знаки зодиака. 
    [*]Отличная успокаивающая музыка.
    [*]Наибольшее погружение только в очках VR.
    [*]Обещают ачивки. Интерррресно!
    [/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198164065886', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1469040067}
review: Wanted to like this one as keen to support vr educational experiences but you can't move around, you just point at installations and sometimes it starts telling you a mythological story but sometimes it just links up the stars with an overlaying picture and the constellation name. And it doesn't have any feeling of being "there" which I've had with other space educational vr experiences. If it was in a planetarium i'd stop for a couple of mins and move on. More like a pseudo interactive 3D educational video, Going to keep it out of support to the idea but planetary socks need pulling up if this is going to be any good in the longer term.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089911040', 'num_games_owned': 743, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1473236944}
review:
等了好久终于又等来的一款国产 VR 体验！！！！

——————————————————

这一次尽管不是游戏类型的 VR 体验，但是却有一种不一样的感受！

上一款国产《ZERO-G》让大家宇宙竞速，这一款就变成了太空看星星！！！

游戏体验轻松和谐，太空背景让你能够投入极大的好奇心。

当然话说回来，这并不是普通的看星星，各种星座让人涨姿势了。（过去无知的我以为只有十二星座）

每一个星座（星球），他们都进行了还原，模型做得很逼真，（他们用的Unity）

这样的星空体验，也不需要玩家走动（避免眩晕），点一下选中的星球，它就会嗖的一下出现在你的面前。

再按一下 Vive 的触摸板可以转动星球，这样的体验相当不错。

总体来说，整个 VR 体验算是一次增长天文知识，放眼宇宙的过程。

有一说一，整个Steam，这款 VR 体验甚至要比大多数老外的 VR 太空漫游好很多！（不吹不黑！）

价格方面，12块很便宜。（美元区，他们卖5.99刀）

那么，要不要支持 Steam 上的国产 VR 呢？ 我不劝你，《Stars》合你胃口的话，你不妨玩一玩。

——————————————————————————

最后，我们下一个 VR 游戏的评测界面见！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198204776849', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2020, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 367, 'last_played': 1477300255}

author: {'steamid': '76561198242576924', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1766, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1473307978}
review: I like this game. It's a good small game to learn how the constellation looks like, and the story of constellation is also interesting. Hope the developer can bring more stories of the constellations.
